title: Can I permit myself to lose in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes being too hard on yourself can be counterproductive. Taking it easy is a sign of experience. I have read many times about an experiment that was performed on children. One group was encouraged and cherished and the other was rebuked for every failure. The children who were rebuked performed poorly. Those who were cherished performed better. I dont remember the name of the experiment but i think this was what it was based upon. Romans 8:28 kjv And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
